page.title: 08FLAX BOURTON RECREATION
page.content: Flax Bourton does not have many recreational facilities. It does however have a thriving cricket club which has its own ground and pavilion. There is a Guide Company and a Brownie Pack. Since there is no Village Hall they meet in a hall at Farleigh Hospital. At the present time plans are being made to build a hall within the village to accomadate the various groups which meet in people's homes. There is the Tuesday Club for the women in the village and a Youth Group for the teenagers. If villagers wish to swim or play raquet games they go either to Backwell or into Bristol. Likewise a visit to the theatre or a concert or cinema involves a journey to Bristol.
